data.title: The Top 100 Executives Of 2024
data.meta_description: Here we present the CRN Top 100 Executives of 2024 list, the men and women who are setting the pace for the rest of the IT industry.
data.text:
Here we present the CRN Top 100 Executives of 2024 list, the men and women who are setting the pace for the rest of the IT industry.

CRN’s annual Top 100 Executives list honors the channel’s forward-thinking leaders.

This year’s No. 1 Most Influential Executive, Microsoft Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella, is putting the pedal to the metal in transforming his company around AI.

Our No. 1 Channel Sales Leader, Dell Technologies Chief Partner Officer Denise Millard, is on a mission to recruit the best partners for the AI moment, while our No. 1 Innovator, Scale Computing co-founder and CEO Jeff Ready, is winning hearts and minds across the channel with the company’s edge architecture.

Meanwhile, our No. 1 Disrupter, Wiz co-founder and CEO Assaf Rappaport, is hard at work to enable faster partner-driven growth in cloud and AI security.

Here we present the CRN Top 100 Executives of 2024 list, the men and women who are setting the pace for the rest of the IT industry.

The 25 Most Influential Executives Of 2024

CRN breaks down the 25 Most Influential Executives of 2024 who are driving sales, transforming their business and paving the way for the future.

The Top 25 IT Innovators Of 2024

The ability to drive innovation for technology products, solutions and services is the hallmark of CRN’s Top 25 Innovators of 2024 list.

The Top 25 Channel Sales Leaders Of 2024

As part of CRN’s Top 100 Executives Of 2024 list, we highlight 25 sales executives leading the channel charge.
